title: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
summary:
### 🌾 Objective
Provide income support of ₹6,000 per year to small and marginal farmers, payable in three equal installments.

**Eligibility:**
- Small & marginal farmers owning up to 2 hectares of cultivable land.
- Excludes institutional landholders and high-income individuals.

**Impact:**
Over 11 crore farmers have benefited since launch.

📌 _Direct cash transfer aimed at improving farm income stability._

title: Ayushman Bharat – Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (PM-JAY)
summary:
### 🏥 Objective
Provide free health coverage of up to ₹5 lakh per family per year for secondary and tertiary care hospitalization.

**Coverage:**
- Over 10.74 crore poor and vulnerable families.
- Cashless and paperless access at empaneled hospitals.

**Key Benefits:**
- Covers pre-existing conditions.
- Nationwide portability.

💡 _Largest government-funded healthcare program in the world._

title: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana (PMUY)
summary:
### 🔥 Objective
Provide LPG connections to women from Below Poverty Line (BPL) households to replace unsafe cooking fuels.

**Features:**
- Free LPG connection with financial assistance.
- Targeting rural and remote areas.

**Impact:**
Over 9 crore connections released.

📢 _Aims to improve health and reduce indoor air pollution._

title: Atal Pension Yojana (APY)
summary:
### 💰 Objective
Provide a defined pension to workers in the unorganized sector after retirement.

**Key Points:**
- Guaranteed pension between ₹1,000 to ₹5,000 per month.
- Government co-contribution for eligible subscribers.

**Target Group:**
Unorganized sector workers aged 18–40 years.

📌 _Secures old-age income for low-income earners._
